remixlab.proscene

Enum Scene.KeyboardAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Scene.KeyboardAction>
      • remixlab.proscene.Scene.KeyboardAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Scene.KeyboardAction>
    Enclosing class:
    Scene

    public static enum Scene.KeyboardAction
extends java.lang.Enum<Scene.KeyboardAction>
    Defines the different actions that can be associated with a specific keyboard key.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      ANIMATION
      Toggles animation.
      ARP_FROM_PIXEL
      Set the arcball reference point from the pixel under the mouse.
      CAMERA_KIND
      Toggles camera kind (proscene or standard).
      CAMERA_PROFILE
      Cycles to the registered camera profiles.
      CAMERA_TYPE
      Toggles camera type (orthographic or perspective.
      CONSTRAIN_FRAME
      Toggles on and off frame constraints (if any).
      CURRENT_CAMERA_PROFILE_HELP
      Displays the current camera profile help.
      DRAW_AXIS
      Toggles the display of the world axis.
      DRAW_FRAME_SELECTION_HINT
      Toggle interactive frame selection region drawing.
      DRAW_GRID
      Toggles the display of the XY grid.
      EDIT_CAMERA_PATH
      Toggles the key frame camera paths (if any) for edition.
      FOCUS_INTERACTIVE_FRAME
      Toggle interactivity between camera and interactive frame (if any).
      GLOBAL_HELP
      Displays the global help.
      RESET_ARP
      Reset the arcball reference point to the 3d frame world origin.
